mutants.code:
from collections import defaultdict
from typing import List, Tuple

def find_max_subset(text: str) -> Tuple[str, int, List[Tuple[int, int]]]:
    n = len(text)
    count_dict = defaultdict(list)
    max_len = 1
    max_str = ''
    for i in range(n):
        temp_str = ''
        for j in range(i, n):
            temp_str += text[j]
            count_dict[temp_str].append((i, j))
            if len(temp_str) > max_len:
                max_len = len(temp_str)
                max_str = temp_str
    max_subset = max_str
    occurrence = len(count_dict[max_str])
    ranges = count_dict[max_str]
    return (max_subset, occurrence, ranges)

    max_str = ''
    for i in range(n):

        for j in range(i, n):
            temp_str += text[j]
            count_dict[temp_str].append((i, j))

                max_str = temp_str
    max_subset = max_str

    ranges = count_dict[max_str]
    return (max_subset, occurrence, ranges)

from collections import defaultdict
from typing import List, Tuple

def find_max_subset(text: str) -> Tuple[str, int, List[Tuple[int, int]]]:
    n = len(text)
    count_dict = defaultdict(list)
    max_len = 0
    max_str = ''
    for i in range(n):
        temp_str = ''
        for j in range(i, n):
            temp_str -= text[j]
            count_dict[temp_str].append((i, j))
            if len(temp_str) > max_len:
                max_len = len(temp_str)
                max_str = temp_str
    max_subset = max_str
    occurrence = len(count_dict[max_str])
    ranges = count_dict[max_str]
    return (max_subset, occurrence, ranges)

from typing import List, Tuple

def find_max_subset(text: str) -> Tuple[str, int, List[Tuple[int, int]]]:
    n = len(text)
    count_dict = defaultdict(list)
    max_len = 0
    max_str = ''
    for i in range(n):
        temp_str = ''
        for j in range(i, n):
            temp_str += text[j]
            count_dict[temp_str].append((i, j))
            if len(temp_str) <= max_len:
                max_len = len(temp_str)
                max_str = temp_str
    max_subset = max_str
    occurrence = len(count_dict[max_str])
    ranges = count_dict[max_str]
    return (max_subset, occurrence, ranges)

from collections import defaultdict
from typing import List, Tuple

def find_max_subset(text: str) -> Tuple[str, int, List[Tuple[int, int]]]:
    n = len(text)
    count_dict = defaultdict(list)
    max_len = 0
    max_str = ''
    for i in range(n):
        temp_str = ''
        for j in range(i, n):
            temp_str += text[j]
            count_dict[temp_str].append((i, j))
            if len(temp_str) != max_len:
                max_len = len(temp_str)
                max_str = temp_str
    max_subset = max_str
    occurrence = len(count_dict[max_str])
    ranges = count_dict[max_str]
    return (max_subset, occurrence, ranges)
